SELECT PROD_ID, PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_PRICE, PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT, PROD_INFO, PROD_STATUS, REG_DATE, PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID, PROD_MAIN_CATE_NAME, PROD_SUB_CATE_ID, PROD_SUB_CATE_NAME, HEART FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PROD_ID, PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_PRICE, PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT, PROD_INFO, PROD_STATUS, REG_DATE, PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID, PROD_MAIN_CATE_NAME, PROD_SUB_CATE_ID, PROD_SUB_CATE_NAME, HEART FROM ( SELECT A.PROD_ID, NVL(A.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, '') PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, NVL(A.PROD_NAME, '') PROD_NAME, NVL(A.PROD_PRICE, 0) PROD_PRICE, NVL(A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT, 0) PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT, NVL(A.PROD_INFO, '') PROD_INFO, NVL(A.PROD_STATUS, '') PROD_STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(C.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID, '') PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID, NVL(B.PROD_MAIN_CATE_NAME, '') PROD_MAIN_CATE_NAME, NVL(C.PROD_SUB_CATE_ID, '') PROD_SUB_CATE_ID, NVL(C.PROD_SUB_CATE_NAME, '') PROD_SUB_CATE_NAME, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WISHLIST W WHERE W.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND W.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS HEART FROM PROD A, PROD_MAIN_CATE B, PROD_SUB_CATE C WHERE A.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = C.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID AND B.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID = C.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID
AND C.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID LIKE '%' || #{cateId} || '%'
AND (A.PROD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR A.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT X.PROD_ID FROM PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE X, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE Y WHERE X.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ))
AND A.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT X.PROD_ID FROM PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE X, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE Y WHERE X.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_NAME = #{gender} )
AND A.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT X.PROD_ID FROM PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE X, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE Y WHERE X.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{brand} || '%' )
AND A.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT X.PROD_ID FROM PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE X, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE Y WHERE X.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{material} || '%' )
AND (A.PROD_PRICE * (1 - (A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT / 100))) >= #{priceStartRow}
AND (A.PROD_PRICE * (1 - (A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT / 100))) <= #{priceEndRow}
ORDER BY
TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(A.PROD_ID, 5))
NVL( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST W WHERE W.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID), 0 )
A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT
TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(A.PROD_ID, 5))
DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(PROD_ID) AS PROD_ID FROM PROD A, PROD_MAIN_CATE B, PROD_SUB_CATE C WHERE A.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = C.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID AND B.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID = C.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID
AND C.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID LIKE '%' || #{cateId} || '%'
AND (A.PROD_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR A.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT X.PROD_ID FROM PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE X, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE Y WHERE X.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' ))
AND A.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT X.PROD_ID FROM PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE X, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE Y WHERE X.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_NAME = #{gender} )
AND A.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT X.PROD_ID FROM PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE X, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE Y WHERE X.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{brand} || '%' )
AND A.PROD_ID IN ( SELECT X.PROD_ID FROM PROD_FILTER_OPTION_VALUE X, FILTER_OPTION_VALUE Y WHERE X.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID = Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_ID AND Y.FILTER_OPTION_VALUE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{material} || '%' )
AND (A.PROD_PRICE * (1 - (A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT / 100))) >= #{priceStartRow}
AND (A.PROD_PRICE * (1 - (A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT / 100))) <= #{priceEndRow}

SELECT A.PROD_ID, NVL(A.PROD_NAME, '') AS PROD_NAME, NVL(A.PROD_PRICE, 0) AS PROD_PRICE, NVL(A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT, 0) AS PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT, NVL(A.PROD_INFO, '') AS PROD_INFO, NVL(A.PROD_STATUS, '') AS PROD_STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(B.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID, '') AS PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WISHLIST W WHERE W.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND W.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS HEART FROM PROD A, PROD_MAIN_CATE B, PROD_SUB_CATE C WHERE A.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = C.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID AND B.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID = C.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}

SELECT VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_ID, VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_NAME FROM VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE WHERE VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_ID IN( SELECT VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB_ID FROM VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB WHERE PROD_ID = #{value} AND VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB_STOCK > 0 AND VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB_ID NOT LIKE '%DEFAULT%' )

SELECT VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_ID, VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_NAME FROM VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE WHERE VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_ID IN ( SELECT SUBSTR(VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB_ID, 1, INSTR(VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB_ID, '_THEME_') - 1) VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_ID FROM VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB WHERE PROD_ID = #{value} AND VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB_STOCK > 0 )

SELECT VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_ID, VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_NAME FROM VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE WHERE VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_ID IN ( SELECT SUBSTR(VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB_ID, INSTR(VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB_ID, '_THEME_') + 1) VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_ID FROM VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB WHERE PROD_ID = #{value} AND VARIANTS_OPTION_VALUE_COMB_STOCK > 0 )

WITH WISHLIST_COUNT AS ( SELECT PROD_ID, COUNT(*) AS WISH_COUNT FROM WISHLIST GROUP BY PROD_ID ) SELECT A.PROD_ID, NVL(A.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, '') PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID, NVL(A.PROD_NAME, '') PROD_NAME, NVL(A.PROD_PRICE, 0) PROD_PRICE, NVL(A.PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT, 0) PROD_DISCOUNT_PERCENT, NVL(A.PROD_INFO, '') PROD_INFO, NVL(A.PROD_STATUS, '') PROD_STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(C.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID, '') PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID, NVL(B.PROD_MAIN_CATE_NAME, '') PROD_MAIN_CATE_NAME, NVL(C.PROD_SUB_CATE_ID, '') PROD_SUB_CATE_ID, NVL(C.PROD_SUB_CATE_NAME, '') PROD_SUB_CATE_NAME, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WISHLIST W WHERE W.PROD_ID = A.PROD_ID AND W.USER_EMAIL = #{value} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS HEART, NVL(W.WISH_COUNT, 0) AS WISH_COUNT FROM PROD A LEFT JOIN WISHLIST_COUNT W ON A.PROD_ID = W.PROD_ID JOIN PROD_SUB_CATE C ON A.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = C.PROD_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID JOIN PROD_MAIN_CATE B ON B.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID = C.PROD_MAIN_CATE_ID ORDER BY NVL(W.WISH_COUNT, 0) DESC
